<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Blood Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=791)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Protection](/Lessons.aspx?ID=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You consolidate warding energies with a gesture, guarding a creature against attacks from a certain type of foe. Designate one of the following creature traits: [aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1), [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9), [beast](/Traits.aspx?ID=20), [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [construct](/Traits.aspx?ID=35), [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50), [elemental](/Traits.aspx?ID=57), [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), [fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=77), [monitor](/Traits.aspx?ID=111), [ooze](/Traits.aspx?ID=122), [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), or [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). The target gains a +1 status bonus to its saving throws and AC against creatures with that trait. The target is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The status bonus increases to +2.
name: Blood Ward
